docs.lead_paragraph: A nonprofit funded by the Coca-Cola Co. to combat obesity is disbanding following revelations about the beverage maker's involvement with the group.

headline.main: Group Funded by Coke to Fight Obesity Disbanding
headline.print_headline: Group Funded by Coke to Fight Obesity Disbanding

docs.snippet: A nonprofit funded by the Coca-Cola Co. to combat obesity is disbanding following revelations about the beverage maker's involvement with the group.

docs.lead_paragraph: Designer babies or an end to intractable illnesses: A revolutionary technology is letting scientists learn to rewrite the genetic code, aiming to alter DNA in ways that, among other things, could erase disease-causing genes.

headline.main: AP News Guide: Summit Opens Debate on Ethics of Gene Editing
headline.print_headline: AP News Guide: Summit Opens Debate on Ethics of Gene Editing

docs.snippet: Designer babies or an end to intractable illnesses: A revolutionary technology is letting scientists learn to rewrite the genetic code, aiming to alter DNA in ways that, among other things, could erase disease-causing genes.

docs.lead_paragraph: The political system was slow to respond to the truth about cigarettes. Now it’s similarly behind in protecting us from toxic chemicals.

headline.main: Contaminating Our Bodies With Everyday Products

docs.abstract: Nicholas Kristof Op-Ed column highlights reports by International Federation of Gynecology and Obstetrics and Endocrine Society that warn of dangers posed to human health by toxic chemicals contained in products of all kinds; suggests chemical industry today, with its lobbying efforts against regulation, has essentially become what tobacco industry used to be.
docs.snippet: The political system was slow to respond to the truth about cigarettes. Now it’s similarly behind in protecting us from toxic chemicals.

docs.lead_paragraph: When it comes to food, the simple rules are still the best.

headline.main: Could Your Healthy Diet Make Me Fat?
headline.print_headline: Could Your Healthy Diet Make Me Fat?

docs.abstract: Op-Ed article by David S Ludwig highlights study published by Weizmann Institute of Science that suggests personalized nutrition could supplant and be more effective than conventional diet regimens; discusses his own research into issue of obesity and diet, and suggests personalized nutrition should build upon, rather than completely substitute, national dietary guidelines.
docs.snippet: When it comes to food, the simple rules are still the best.
